website_summaries.verdict: The G7 ThinQ hits the latest phone trends and includes signature LG features like a wide-angle camera and audiophile-quality sound for a solid alternative to flagships from Apple and Samsung.
pros: Solid low-light camera mode and AI image tweaking
cons: AI camera processing can be slow

customer_reviews.title: Not UNLOCKED
customer_reviews.text: Phone was LOCKED to Claro network, could not use on my current network (Verizon)
customer_reviews.author: The Cramers

customer_reviews.title: Best Android phone i've had in my life!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, my last 2 phones were both iPhones and I chose Android this time because of the compatiblity with other devices. Why LG G7? Every flagship has the same specs, but the sound on this one... perfection! Pros: - Sound with and without headphones is great, I don't think if anyone could improve this. - O.S. dont freezes, actually is the best LG (I repair phones, so I tested every LG that exists, except for the V30). - AI Cam is great, but it can improve like everything new. Cons: - Facial Recognition is a little bit slower. Great phone! 9.5/10
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas_14

customer_reviews.title: Not factory unlocked phone.
customer_reviews.text: It's not a factory unlocked phone. It's a Claro Wireless phone that someone unlocked. Software and updates come from Claro.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: This is not a US Phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is from Argentina so it may not work as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: This Phone is UNDERRATED !!!!
customer_reviews.text: - LG must be falling short in their Marketing department because this phone flew under the radar.. - This is a Great Product.. there is nothing legitimately negative you can say about this phone - Hot take,... this phone looks better in hand than the new IPhone models in my opinion. Quote me Tim - Graphic Designer
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: LG removed the wide angle selfie that was on the G6 on this one.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the G5 and G6 is because of the wide angle selfie. Now the G7 has quietly removed that feature. If i had known that, i wouldn't order the product. Now i'm returning it and might get the upcoming V40 instead. LG should have been more clear about this on their website and product promotion.
customer_reviews.author: Gun and God

customer_reviews.title: Not new?
customer_reviews.text: Open box? Review keeps getting rejected. I just want people to know it nay not be new as advertised. Seal doubled in pic.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Solid build - great screen - poor battery and camera software
customer_reviews.text: Really love the size and build of this device. The audio was great, the screen was great. Performance really suffered in that the OS did not seem optimized for the hardware (stutters and lags) but this was most evident in the camera software which would lock up during launch or during a photo capture, sometimes not even taking a photo. This was also reflecting in the poor battery life, very moderate use in good signal area resulted in 50% drain with only a few hours (mostly in standby). Wanted to really like this device but it didn't work out.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Phone is from Latin American network Claro.
customer_reviews.text: Having issues connecting to at&t 4GLTE. I was finally able to get connected to AT&T 3G network after being at the AT&T store and on the phone for 2 hours. This phone is from the Latin American network provider Claro and the box instructions (all in Spanish) said LG Panama. This is my 3rd LG G series phone. I like the fit, simplicity, and performance but I dont think I will buy another phone from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: This phone was not compatible with Verizon
customer_reviews.text: This was advertised as compatible with all US carriers, but the phone I received did not have an antenna that could connect to Verizon's network.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brand New Tmobile G7
customer_reviews.text: New in the box Tmobile branded G7. The first thing it did was update to G710TM10n which is Tmobiles November security patch for the G7. Great display. Super loud speakerphone. Has wifi calling, VoLTE and HD Voice. Supports all the Tmobile bands including band 71. Glad I pulled the trigger on this.
customer_reviews.author: Jim D

customer_reviews.title: Used gadget are best....!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a phone by used gadget. This guys are awesome. Initially i ordered this phone which got lost during shipping but used gadget helped me out get me the refund. Then I ordered again the another phone this guys “used gadget”. The phone is in my hand now and I can’t believe that I only paid 200 usd for this amazing phone. It’s not even old. I guess it’s a new phone. I am so thankful to used gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Prateek Bansal

customer_reviews.title: First unit arrived defective -- returned, this unit replaced later and seems fine.
customer_reviews.text: Other than defects, which can happen in any brand and model, once we ordered a replacement this product seems to operate fine. Note that the G7 ThinQ does not have an identical user interface to the LG V35. G7 is much less intuitive to use or find desired settings and appears to be missing some useful settings or options found on the V35 model. Quality of materials is excellent and sound quality is above average, though not as good as as the Moto Droid Turbo 2 it replaced (the T2 had dual sizable front-facing stereo speakers). Given the choice again, now that we know the user interface difference, we would choose the V-series rather than G-series phone.
customer_reviews.author: eNGeeNC

customer_reviews.title: Forget about Using Verizon Visual Voicemail with This Phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone to replace my broken LG G5. All apps work fine except those for Basic and Premium Visual Voicemail. I spent 2+ hours on phone with Verizon to try to resolve the problem. No luck because this phone is not configured to allow those apps to work. I am back to dialing *86 to access voice messages. Pain in the neck!
customer_reviews.author: FF

customer_reviews.title: Don't fall for fake unlocked claim
customer_reviews.text: Hugely disappointed with phone IMEI not in Sprint database and I have even contacted LG. Wastedlot of hours with calls/chats made to Am a zon, LG Customer support, but eventuy have to return the device.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Korada

customer_reviews.title: Lg G7 thinq
customer_reviews.text: Well I honestly am glad I got this phone it's fast I've seen no lag in anything I do I watch alot of movies just wish I could make the videos play a little larger than it allows me to do but great video quality... Picks up service better than my LG Stylo 4 that was branded for metro by T-Mobile shows a lower connection but is not giving as much buffering in my videos even at 1080p quality Would suggest making sure you have either a charger or a battery pack with you the battery isn't as strong as it could be but lasts well enough to get by on most days
customer_reviews.author: Krash

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. $480 sale was fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. Worked perfectly out of the box with my straight talk SIM that uses Verizon's towers. Enabled Google's phone app and visual voice mail works without a hitch. Wish they would hurry up and push the android 9 update they promised. Make sure you buy the one sold and shipped by Amazon instead of the 3rd party sellers if your worried you won't get the correct model like others have claimed. Amazon for sure ships you the carrier unlocked model listed here. And not the sprint variant some people are getting.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone- of you're not in a low signal area
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this because it was recommended for the sound clarity, and I am hard of hearing. Worked great! Awesome phone- however, I live at the end of the ATT signal area -and though my old MotoG often got only one bar, I could always call out and receive calls. But there are times when I have no bars with this phone and have no service indoors... so I am reluctantly sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: IF

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!!!
customer_reviews.text: Been a samsung owner for years but love my G7. Had a few months and its still problem free!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Central America model works in North America
customer_reviews.text: This is a steal right now at the price it is (grey). $430 for the outgoing flagship level phone. I got a factory sealed new LM-G710ULM from Amazon, not a third party. Unlocked G7 GSM. I bought a nano SIM since my old phone had a micro and I didn't want to cut it down. Straight Talk wireless. Service transferred right over in a couple of minutes. I had a G3 and the backup & restore worked like a champ. Toss in the 2nd year of warranty from LG and what's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: The ad says specifically: "The LG G7 Thin Q phone is compatible with AT&T, Sprint, T-Mobile & verizon networks " This is a straight LIE. It is not compatible with ANY of the networks listed above, except att-the most expensive - go figure right? Every single one of those companies says it is not compatible with their networks..
customer_reviews.author: Drokkenian

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone design with it didn't have so much bloat ware and the signal isn't too strong in some areas live the wireless charging though and the quad dac plus battery life could be better
customer_reviews.author: dizzkid

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come unlocked
customer_reviews.text: It would have been a five-star review had the phone itself came unlocked so I could use it with my carrier of choice. Given that it is advertised to be as such and my carrier told me that their systems are showing it as non-accessible due to being locked to a differing carrier that's not really acceptable. Given the quite rather false advertisement of the product, a refund would be preferable- especially if one is expected to foot the unlocking payments themselves / switch carriers.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Surpassed my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping . Got here in less than 3 days which is really quite fast during the health crisis. I feel like they rate the condition conservatively favoring the customer not the business because my phone was in better shape than I thought it would be in. If the need arises I will happily buy again
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: LG is terrible
customer_reviews.text: This phone is locked to Claro which is in South America. It is Sep 2019 and still do not have the Pie Update!!! So disappointed for a $450 phone. Its a shame because the hardware is great, LG simply does not care about existing customers and only focus on new products G8 etc. Guess what LG, anyone who buys your phone will never get another one! You will eventually run out of suckers.
customer_reviews.author: Creative_Industrial

customer_reviews.title: User-friendly
customer_reviews.text: I like the phone. LG is very user-friendly. Only thing I don't like is that it has "Claro" on it. Think it was made for spanish-speaking countries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank You for a Wonderful phone!
customer_reviews.text: the phone is brand new,as advertized. The LG G7 ThinQ was introduced later in 2017,but this LG phone will do ALL the THINGS I need it to do for me. It was a terriffic buy! Thank-you. I have called "the seller, a few times" to help me acquire features on the LG7. They have been very kind with helping me operate this new phone.
customer_reviews.author: James Hammons

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery, Camera, And UI
customer_reviews.text: I use this for everyday use and it's a great product for the normal user. The battery will get you through the day, the camera is top notch, the screen is nice and bright, and the opperating system/UI is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Milbauer

customer_reviews.title: Not an unlocked phone.  The listing is a lie
customer_reviews.text: If you buy one of these it is almost certainly going to be for one carrier or another. It will still work on Google Fi, but you don't get all of the features.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy is wayyyyy better
customer_reviews.text: Was my first Android phone so I don't have much to compare it to. But I just didn't like it right off the bat. I traded it in for a Galaxy s9+ and I LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Great for Android lovers
customer_reviews.text: Very good phone if you like Android. Tried to love it but went back to my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Pace

customer_reviews.title: Not unlocked, on Claro network. Headphone jack doesn't work after less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: The phone itself is nice. I wouldn't recommend this seller(breed). It wasn't unlocked as stated and it has little to no trade in value. Major service providers aren't taking this type of phone as a Bring your own phone deal. Its not compatible.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Didn,t like lgg7 thinQ.
customer_reviews.text: The phone stopped working.for a minute or 2 when open or freezes.it was nothing as advertised.so I decided 2 send it back.and wait on something else.
customer_reviews.author: verran z stewart

customer_reviews.title: Its no good
customer_reviews.text: I would in a conversation and they cannot hear me....i can hear them .it just shut off all the time.its not good for me
customer_reviews.author: Juliet Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Everything was perfect. Phone was as new. Three weeks so far and no issues
customer_reviews.author: Raul Marita

customer_reviews.title: Not Fully compatible with Sprint network
customer_reviews.text: Wifi Calling and VOLTE services are disabled for the Sprint network. Other unlocked phones from Apple, Google, Samsung, and even Essential have figured out how to get wifi calling working universally, nut not LG.
customer_reviews.author: C. To

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone
customer_reviews.text: My husband is loving his phone. Battery life is great and looks amazing. Great deal too.
customer_reviews.author: Estela Lozdon

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece...
customer_reviews.text: Im please with the purchase was a good update from my g5.100% unlocked Phone overall is nice the only thing that I'm upset about is that it was a new purchase and headphones are missing!
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz

customer_reviews.title: Incorrectly advertised as compatible with Sprint Network
customer_reviews.text: Phone was advertised as compatible with Sprint network but it cannot be activated by Sprint. Description is inaccurate and/or fraudulent. Returning to amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Bronstein

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone with great features. It doesn't require lots of charging because the battery life is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: INGRID MCDONALD

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware of product device!!!
customer_reviews.text: Like the phone BUT IT'S LOCKED TO T MOBILE DESCRIPTION SAID UNLOCKED FOR ALL GSM WILL NOT BUY FROM POWER UP DEAL AGAIN VERY DISPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: Consumer buyer

customer_reviews.title: NOT ALL THESES PHONES ARE COMPATIBLE WITH VERIZON
customer_reviews.text: paid for this phone, bought it to verizon and it wasnt compatible with the network. Thanks a lot. It says in the description it is.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Need A Good Phone...
customer_reviews.text: So I've had this phone before (I traded it for a G8) and I needed a backup phone so I got the G7 again! Both G7 & G8 are great phones! Either one will do tje job!
customer_reviews.author: Lenny

customer_reviews.title: Customer service didn't care
customer_reviews.text: Did not work on my carrier, though the description said it would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on Boost Mobile Network!
customer_reviews.text: The phone may be unlocked but if you are like me and have Boost Mobile network do not buy this phone as they do not support it as of the date this comment is posted. BE WARNED!
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Waguespack

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product at competitive pricing
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have purchased my other phone from here. The product arrived as described no issues so far!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Works good battery life could be better
customer_reviews.text: Came in everthing looked new even though they are used but good phone
customer_reviews.author: Martin hinojosa

customer_reviews.title: Good but, button fell out.
customer_reviews.text: Good affordable phone. But one of the volume buttons fell out. I'm not sure how.
customer_reviews.author: Adam A.

customer_reviews.title: This phone sucks!
customer_reviews.text: It was defective out of the box. Don't buy an LG product their customer service is horrible at best!!!!
customer_reviews.author: david oliver

customer_reviews.title: Phone is not compatible with Verizon
customer_reviews.text: The description is absolutely wrong. The phone I received will not work on Verizon.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Eppinghoff

customer_reviews.title: Raspberry color!!
customer_reviews.text: I am an Android Girl. This phone is great, thin, and extremely loud! Great Volume.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: could not use
customer_reviews.text: it says it will work on sprint network. Did not work, disappointed! I would give it zero stars , but would not let me
customer_reviews.author: DONALD T. HARDY,JR

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: My phone came completely unlocked and I'm enjoying it so far. I just wish the battery was a little bigger, but it comes with a quick charger.
customer_reviews.author: ben belote

customer_reviews.title: Fraudulent Listing - NOT Unlocked
customer_reviews.text: This listing is a lie. The device is not unlocked and does not work with US Carriers.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Malugani

customer_reviews.title: Good, but have its downsides..
customer_reviews.text: It didn't come with the earbuds, just the charger and the cable.
customer_reviews.author: Oswaldo Granda

customer_reviews.title: It looks new!
customer_reviews.text: The items looks new even though it was advertised as used-acceptable. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Mariñez

customer_reviews.title: For price, very good device
customer_reviews.text: Good phone with good color reproduction in photos. However I had a problem with it staying connected to wifi.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Worst customer service!
customer_reviews.text: It can never able to make a call. And the customer service is the worst I’ve even seen!
customer_reviews.author: Ee

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone Overall
customer_reviews.text: Camera is excellent. Phone is easy to navigate. Size is not strange to hold. The customizable features are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: 4 Hands

customer_reviews.title: Phone was not as described.
customer_reviews.text: The description said this phone was Verizon compatible and it is not. Returned and will not buy from again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Phone is true to the condition described by the seller @MaxTech. Great value for money!
customer_reviews.author: Anwar

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn’t match description
customer_reviews.text: The description of the product says unlocked and it came password protected.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Sampy

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great snapdragon 845 phone! Two years old and plenty powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Tay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Phone
customer_reviews.text: I'm fairly certain my husband is absolutely in love with this phone!!
customer_reviews.author: Kari Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Phone not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Good looking phone but it is a Spanish version of the phone and is also not compatible with Verizon. Even though they said it was compatible with Verizon. Not LGs fault that the phone was not as advertised. Am returning it in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: DemDog

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly on AT&T, very snappy phone, extremely loud audio, would buy again !
customer_reviews.author: Jon Whipple

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Battery life and good External speaker volume
customer_reviews.text: I love the 2 full days I can go without a recharge and spending 3 to 4 hours a day using the phone. If you've got the money for this phone its a wise choice it uses both GSM and CDMA bands just depends on the sim card you put in it as Ive had both types of sim cards installed I would have preferred that the back came off or they would have sent the key to open the tray for replacing the sim card and the external storage for the price you pay it should be included but instead I had to order the sim card key from amazon too
customer_reviews.author: fun12u

customer_reviews.title: A flagship phone that won't break the bank
customer_reviews.text: Is this phone cheap? No. Is this phone overly expensive? Also no. It's got a great headphone jack with a custom quad DAC chip built into the phone co-developed between ESS and LG. It will drive your higher end headphones well. It has google assistant built in. It has a decent size battery and all the latest doodads to charge it including quick charge and QI wireless charging. The processor puts it on equal footing with the S9+. Also it has this nice new feature where you can use it to place telephone calls. Crazy what they can do with technology these days.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone and yes it does work on Verizon even if Verizon says it won't.
customer_reviews.text: Phone works great. After I got the phone I called Verizon and they said the phone is not compatible with their network. I said ok. After the call I took the Sim card out of my old phone placed it in this phone and everything started working properly. Calls are crystal clear, text video and pictures messaging works fine, and no problems with data. This phone is super nice great screen resolution great picture quality. Excellent phone
customer_reviews.author: J. Frantz

customer_reviews.title: Not new at all
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t a new product. Came in with seal already broken. Can’t trust electronic products that are used. Dishonest.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: False advertising.
customer_reviews.text: While I have no complaints about the overall performance of the phone, it is NOT AS ADVERTISED. It's on a network called Claro and is third party unlocked. Not factory unlocked as seller claims.
customer_reviews.author: JSuggs

customer_reviews.title: Good phone good price
customer_reviews.text: Like the phone. Good camera. Smart phone, not as smart owner so still exploring features. Battery life is remarkable! Great photos. Have not tried fingerprint reader or face recognition yet. Had the phone exactly one week when we were in a head on wreck. Phone was in my purse which a bystander put under my head as I Iaid in street waiting for ambulance. After I was taken to hospital phone was used to photograph accident scene. Sturdy phone! Great photos (which clearly documented other party totally at fault).
customer_reviews.author: Bob's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone with a great camera!
customer_reviews.text: One of my utmost favorite phones. The photos posted are taken using the Live Photos function which does movement before and after the photo is actually taken. Highly recommended with no criticisms!
customer_reviews.author: GreatGiftGuru

customer_reviews.title: Verizon phone, NOT unlocked.
customer_reviews.text: Phone is Verizon, not unlocked. Item is used, but in very good condition/basically new. I'm leaving 4 stars because if you're looking for a Verizon G7 that's like new, this is a good deal. But if you're like me, on T-Mobile, this is basically a fancy brick. First time I had to return something to Amazon. Bummer because the phone is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Battery needs work
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok phone, but the battery is no good. It charges really fast; but if you make a few calls, check your social media page, OR play one good game, then the phone is giving you that "down to 15%" message for you to charge your phone. If the battery lasted longer, I would actually give it five stars. The face and voice recognition work 90 % of the time...which is alright with me because I also have a PIN to unlock it.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: does not work on Verizon
customer_reviews.text: I returned the phone because it did not work on verizon network. AT&T said the guy at the verizon store and the guy I called directly at Verizon. Just not good
customer_reviews.author: BethAnn

customer_reviews.title: Not factory unlocked
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful phone, but the phone is not factory unlocked. I confirmed with Motorola this phone was tied to a specific carrier and I could not activate with Google Fi. It also has no us warranty according to them. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Superpanda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: As good or better than advertised. Was unable to get everything transferred with Verizon. Verizon pouty about buying online and not signing another worthless contract with them :-) Battery lif is unbelievable compared to the Motorla Razr that I had. Great pictures too.
customer_reviews.author: WL Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Receive timely
customer_reviews.text: I gave 5 stars to everything. However, I did not realize the phone had face recognition. Will check into it. So far so good, I love the phone! This is an upgrade from my LG G6, I thought that took nice pictures. The LG G7 ThinQ takes exceptional pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: there is nothing this phone does not do well. Fast and good battery life. The display really is readable in bright sunlight, and the sound is very loud and clear.
customer_reviews.author: netman

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far it's worked nicely, sound it great. Have had a few glitches, nothing major. Battery life is average, similar to most phones. One down side is voicemail with Verizon won't work... At all.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our old Samsung with this LG G7 ThinQ. What a difference. Better quality overall.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Broyhill

customer_reviews.title: Wifi calling does not work if you have at&t, does not have VOLTE or HD voice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone to use on at&t and it works fine. Wifi calling does not work with at&t and that's what I need to be able to use it in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for Verizon
customer_reviews.text: I recommend the phone but not the seller (ironically, LG). As many others had reported, this phone does not work on Verizon as described. It only supports GSM. I should have listened to the other reviews and saved myself the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Bauman

customer_reviews.title: verizon compatible? likely not
customer_reviews.text: unless there is a way to finesse the process. the average verizon official store employee, and your own personal effort to manually activate on verizon's website, ended with, 'it's not compatible"
customer_reviews.author: Dr. hooster

customer_reviews.title: Worth It !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Installed my Verizon SIM card have a phone retrieved my info from the cloud and Google no problem Great value for what I paid!
customer_reviews.author: mark johnson

customer_reviews.title: No as describe in the picture
customer_reviews.text: It came without charger neither box. The picture shows box and charge however I only received the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Bubaloo

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th LG phone. I really like the LG environment, but I'm not going to pay for the current flagship phone, so buying the previous model is a good option for me. The LG-G7 is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: H. Brown

product_meta.title: LG Electronics G7 ThinQ Factory Unlocked Phone - 6.1" Screen - 64GB - Aurora Black (U.S. Warranty)
product_meta.description: Color:Aurora BlackWhat's it Gonna take? the LG G7 ThinQ delivers thoughtful intelligence, inside and out. Capture the perfect shot with a camera so clever it knows exactly what you're shooting - recognizing up to 19 subject options. Search what you see - use Google lens to explore the world around you, find the names of buildings, and even translate text - all right from your camera. Bump the bass - turn up the bass to give your premium audio experience a boost of loud, room-filling sound. Surround sound to go - DTS: x 3D surround audio brings spatial sound to the LG G7 thing so audio seems to come from all directions-even overhead. Super far field voice recognition means your Google assistant is always there to help and will respond with real-time support from anywhere in the room.
feature_bullets: 6.1" QHD+ full vision display with notch
Super bright Camera. Screen Resolution 3120 x 1440 pixels
Dual 16MP/16MP wide rear Camera w/ real glass lens
Boom box speaker. Carrier Compatibility - The LG G7 ThinQ phone is compatible with AT&T, Sprint, T-Mobile & Verizon networks. Please check with your carrier to verify compatibility

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars274 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: LG G7 ThinQ, Travel Adapter, Data Cable, Quick Start Guide, SIM tray opener, Stereo Earbud
